divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the second night this has happened... Enough is enough... once you read this, watch this and call the news station around you..... People are to speak up and say this is direct contact.... The News stations in WV and PITT will know who I am.... They are messenger's of peace... And giver's of knowledge, for they are the chariots of fire, goddess's if you will, the phoenix in the sky... Every nation has won, every nation's can stop fighting... This is peace on earth. Orion in the sky, hands up in victory for all mankind. This is the Garden of the new israel, for it is the land of the copper scroll, for it was destroyed and split up among time, and we did evolve... every knowledge and religion pagan or not is right.....There is life outside ourselves... that gave us this earth....This is the return to paradise. Not destruction but recreation..A chance for all nations to bind together, and peace on earth....
